claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Sarcoidosis is a disease involving abnormal collections of inflammatory cells that form lumps known as granulomas .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The disease usually begins in the lungs , skin , or lymph nodes .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.

premise_source_doc_sentence: The cause of sarcoidosis is unknown .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Some believe it may be due to an immune reaction to a trigger such as an infection or chemicals in those who are genetically predisposed .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Findings that make it likely include large lymph nodes at the root of the lung on both sides , high blood calcium with a normal parathyroid hormone level , or elevated levels of angiotensin converting enzyme  (  ACE  )  in the blood .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The diagnosis should only be made after excluding other possible causes of similar symptoms such as tuberculosis .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Many people clear up without any treatment within a few years .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: However some may have long term or severe disease .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Some symptoms may be improved with the use of anti-inflammatory drugs such as ibuprofen .

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.

claim: Sarcoidosis is described as a non-painful skin disease.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2015 pulmonary sarcoidosis and interstitial lung disease affected 1.9 million people globally and they resulted in 122,000 deaths .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Sarcoidosis was first described in 1877 by the English doctor Jonathan Hutchinson as a non painful skin disease .
